articles.author: Jill Cornfield
articles.title: Short-term health plans could be a buyer beware form of health insurance
articles.description: President Trump wants to extend the time you can use short-term health insurance but some states prohibit the plans altogether.
articles.content: Heather Kofke-Egger knows first-hand the risks of depending on a plan with skimpy benefits. Just out of college in 2002, she could pay $450 a month for a health plan offered to new graduates, or $85 a month for a short-term plan. "I knew I was taking a risk,"… [+1874 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Berger
articles.title: 'Shark Tank' secrets from founder of 'Tank' reject Ring, which Amazon bought for $1 billion
articles.description: Jamie Siminoff didn't like the offer he got from Kevin O'Leary on "Shark Tank" in 2013, so the founder left empty-handed. But in 2018, Amazon bought his company, Ring, for $1 billion.  Now, he's a guest judge on the season 10 premiere spilling behind-the-scen…
articles.content: As a guest judge instead of a contestant, several elements of the show surprised Siminoff, who says he's been a fan of "Shark Tank" for years. He was impressed by the lucrative portfolios the judges have built from "Shark Tank" businesses and that the Sharks … [+1266 chars]

articles.author: Darren Geeter
articles.title: The business of owning an NFL team
articles.description: Owning a team in the National Football League can be a profitable endeavor. Some clubs are valued at more than $2 billion and pull in hundreds of millions of dollars each year.

articles.author: Jessica Dickler
articles.title: Sharing is caring, particularly with Netflix, Hulu and Uber accounts
articles.description: A new study shows that 3 out of 4 Americans are sharing streaming, shopping and mobile accounts such as Netflix, Hulu and Amazon Prime with their family, friends and even exes.
articles.content: As most kindergarteners know, sharing is caring. That's also true for grownups, particularly those with a Netflix account. div > div.group > p:first-child"> Altogether, 3 out of 4 Americans are sharing streaming, shopping and mobile accounts such as … [+1244 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Trump said to prepare a measure to boost ethanol measure ahead of a trip to Iowa
articles.description: President Donald Trump is expected to announce the lifting of a federal ban on summer sales of higher-ethanol blends of gasoline on Tuesday in Washington DC ahead of a trip to Iowa the same day, according to two sources familiar with the planning of the event…
articles.content: The American Petroleum Institute, the largest U.S. oil group, opposes lifting the ban, which will eat into the industry's market share of gasoline sales. The move also faces bipartisan opposition in congress. The U.S. Renewable Fuel Standard requires refiners… [+503 chars]

articles.title: 'Million Dollar Listing' star explains why high end real estate is like selling body wax memberships
articles.description: "The biggest mistake most people make when they try to sell something, whether it's real estate, hot tubs or tires, is that they actually try to sell something," says Ryan Serhant.
